meanings.definition: A type of glass-ceramic material known for its high resistance to thermal shock.
meanings.sent1: The pyroceram plate did not crack when exposed to extreme heat.
meanings.sent2: I bought a set of pyroceram dishes for their durability in the oven.
meanings.sent3: The pyroceram bowl laughed at the hot soup poured into it.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was like pyroceram, unbreakable even in the face of adversity.
meanings.sent5: The pyroceram material glowed brightly under the intense heat of the flame.

meanings.definition: A brand name for a specific type of glass-ceramic material used in cookware and laboratory equipment.
meanings.sent1: The store sells pyroceram pots and pans for cooking enthusiasts.
meanings.sent2: Scientists prefer using pyroceram containers for their experiments.
meanings.sent3: The pyroceram brand threw a party for all the kitchen utensils.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like pyroceram as she admired the shiny cookware.
meanings.sent5: The laboratory equipment made of pyroceram stood out for its quality and durability.
